dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: The UCF101 dataset includes 101 action classes, over 13,000 video clips and 27 hours of video data. It contains realistic uploaded videos with camera motion and custom backgrounds, making it a comprehensive dataset for action recognition.
dcterms:title: UCF101

dcterms:creator: Z. Tu
W. Xie
Q. Qin
R. Poppe
R. Veltkamp
B. Li
J. Yuan
M.-s. CNN
dcterms:description: The UCF Sports dataset contains 150 videos of sports broadcasts captured in cluttered and dynamic environments, with 10 action classes, each corresponding to one action.
dcterms:title: UCF Sports
